text:
To everyone,
We will have an open meeting on *18.12.2020 at 3pm CET*. If you have anything in mind that you like to discuss/ask (things that bother you, feature requests, …) or just want to hang out then fell free to join the video call. I’ll post the invite link in time in this channel.

We will have an open meeting on

. If you have anything in mind that you like to discuss/ask (things that bother you, feature requests, …) or just want to hang out then fell free to join the video call. I’ll post the invite link in time in this channel.

text: If I won't be able to join the open meetings is the video call recorded? Were there any previous video calls that I missed out and are they recorded so I can follow?

elements.text: If I won't be able to join the open meetings is the video call recorded? Were there any previous video calls that I missed out and are they recorded so I can follow?

text: This is the first one and I don’t think we will record it. But we can consider recording the meetings for the future.
